sentences.en: Calculator can add and subtract as well as and divide.
sentences.cn: 计算机能够加减,也能够乘除.

sentences.en: Children should be able to add and subtract in the third grade.
sentences.cn: 孩子们应该在三年级的时候学会加法和减法.

sentences.en: Click the down arrow to subtract points from an attribute.
sentences.cn: 按向下箭头会从特技中减去点数.

sentences.en: If you subtract 3 from 5, you get 2.
sentences.cn: 五减去三就得二.

sentences.en: If you subtract 3 from 7, you have 4.
sentences.cn: 七减三等于四.

sentences.en: If you subtract 30 from 45, you get 15.
If you subtract 6 from 9, you will have 3.
sentences.cn: 九减六等于三.

sentences.en: Mandy subtracted the date of birth from the date of death.
sentences.cn: 曼迪从死亡的日期减去了出生的日期。

sentences.en: Subtract 3 from 7 and you have 4.
sentences.cn: 七减三得四.

sentences.en: Subtract four from nine and you have five.
sentences.cn: 九减四得五.

sentences.en: SuBtract three from eight and the remainder will Be five.
sentences.cn: 八减三等于五.

sentences.en: That is, if you find that a sensor consistently overestimates by a certain value, you can subtract that value before the final value is reported.
sentences.cn: 也就是说，如果您发现某个传感器总是偏高于某个特定数值，那么就可以减去该数值后再报告最终的数值。

sentences.en: The digital computer, in its computation section, can do mainly two things - add or subtract.
sentences.cn: 数字计算机在其运算部分主要能作两项工作 ― ―加或减.

sentences.en: The little girl has begun to learn to add and subtract.
sentences.cn: 这小女孩已在学做加减法了.

sentences.en: The pupil could add and subtract but hadn't learned to divide.
sentences.cn: 这名小学生能做加法和减法,但还没学会做除法.

sentences.en: Their first device could add, subtract, multiply and divide.
sentences.cn: 他们的最初设计是可以计算加法 、 减法 、 乘法和除法.

sentences.en: Then the deal is that when you sell the house they subtract -you've got to pay this.
sentences.cn: 那么当你售出房子后，他们会从中减去，这个余额，这就是你要付给他们的。

sentences.en: Thus, if you have staff activities in loops and want to run the above request, you need to ensure that you subtract only events which belong together.
sentences.cn: 因此，如果您在循环中具有人员活动，并且想要运行以上的请求，那么您必须确保您只减去了属于一起的事件。

sentences.en: You have to subtract 25 % tax from the sum you receive.
sentences.cn: 你必须从所得款中扣除25%的税款.

sentences.en: You must learn to add and subtract in arithmetic.
sentences.cn: 学算术要学会加法和减法.

trans.tran_en: to take a number or an amount from a larger number or amount
to take a number or an amount from a larger number or amount
